name: Waffuru
description:
Extract Those Star Pieces!

  • 2D survival shooter
  • extract dropped star pieces across 5 maps
  • risk your banked points and continue fighting for greater rewards

Controls

  • A and D to move left and right
  • point and click to shoot
  • W to jump
  • hold E to extract held star pieces

Game-A-Month-Athon 7/12

This project was created as part of the Ruddy Good GAMA, where I've set out to create a bite-size experimental game each month! 

 January 2021
